resources.string: This app used be about Berlin only. Now it starts to support multiple cities. We hope you enjoy this. Please select your desired city below.
You do not have the %s map installed yet, but you can install it through Google Play.
You have to update the %s map to the latest version before you can show stations on the map.

This app is intended to give you the opportunity to explore the public transportation network of a few cities such as Berlin and Vienna. The app is still kind of a prototype, but already provides some useful information.
The information presented here is taken from the OpenStreetMap project. The data is licensed under the Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL).
